          <title>
            <string language="en">Female and male sex chromosomes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weibliche und männliche Geschlechtchromosomen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chromosomes femelles et mâles de sexe</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the sex chromosomes of two females (left and middle) and a male (right).</string>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les chromosomes de sexe

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os chromosomes do sexo de

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i cromosomi del sesso

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει χρωμοσώματα φύλων δύο
